snippet: The summer of Hillary Rodham Clinton’s discontent continued on the Sunday talk shows, as the political class continued to chew on the challenges facing her candidacy. Ben Carson defended himself against claims by Donald J. Trump, and Senator Bernie...
abstract: The summer of Hillary Rodham Clinton’s discontent continued on the Sunday talk shows, as the political class continued to chew on the challenges facing her candidacy. Ben Carson defended himself against claims by Donald J. Trump, and Senator Bernie Sanders discussed foreign policy.

headline.main: Ben Carson and Bernie Sanders, on the Rise and on the Talk Shows
